name: JB's IT Blog
tagline: A IT project site to test out the features of Github
body:
# JB's IT Blog 

Welcome to JB's IT website. Here I'll post any IT topics I find interesting. These topics will include:
*  Cisco networking
*  The latest Virus news
*  News regarding virtual machine software.
 
I hope you enjoy reading the blog.

***
## Topics of Interest

In New Zealand, Domino's are using drones to deliver pizza's. Domino's has teamed up with drone delivery service Flirtey to deliver it's pizzas via the sky. The "world's first pizza-by-drone" commercial trials began on the week,starting the 14 of November. Here's a [link](http://au.pcmag.com/drones/44881/news/in-new-zealand-your-dominos-delivery-guy-is-a-drone) to the full article.

## Useful Links
### [Australia Computer Society](https://www.acs.org.au/home.html)
The Australian Computer Society (ACS) is an association for information and communications technology professionals in Australia. They have over 22,000 members Australia-wide. It's objective is to "to advance professional excellence in information technology" and "to promote the development of Australian information and communications technology resources".

### [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/)
A question and answer site for IT professionals and enthusiast.

### [Lifehacker](http://www.lifehacker.com.au/)
A blog that offers time-saving tips of just about every stripe, from Firefox shortcuts to tips on how to stay productive before just going on holidays.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
